rules_text:
{1}{W}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. 
When this creature attacks, if a card left your graveyard this turn, surveil 2. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
